Cause Fear (S1 Necr): R65' Target w/up to 5 HD flees for 1d4 rd (DC 14 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Claws Of Darkness (S2 Illu): Self hands become 6' extendable claws that inflict 1d4 HP and slow via grapple (DC 15 Fort neg) for 16 rd
Displacement (S3 Illu): Foes attacking touched suffer 50% miss chance for 16 rd
Eagle's Splendor (S2 Tran): Touched gains +4 Charisma for 16 min
Greater Magic Weapon (S3 Tran): R65' target weapon gains +4 attack and damage for 16 hr
Haste (S3 Tran): R65' 16 targets in 15' radius gain extra attack, +1 attack, AC, and Reflex, and +30' Speed for 16 rd
Hold Portal (S1 Abju): R260' Door, gate, or window magically held shut for 16 min
Hypnotism (S1 Ench): R65' Fascinates and makes suggestible 2d4 HD of creatures in 15' radius (DC 14 Will neg, +2 during combat, -2 single target) for 2d4 rd
Levitate (S2 Tran): R65' Self moves willing target up and down 20'/rd for 16 min
Light (S0 Evoc): Touched gives 20' bright light for 160 min
Magic Missile (S1 Evoc): R260' 5 missiles inflict 1d4+1 HP each in 15' radius
Magic Mouth (S2 Illu): R65' Mouth appears and speaks 25 words upon trigger w/in 240' (DC 15 Will neg)
Mending (S0 Tran): R10' Repairs minor damage to 1 lb object
Protection From Chaos (S1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. chaotic creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nonlawful summoned creatures for 16 min
Protection From Evil (S1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. evil creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nongood summoned creatures for 16 min
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R65' Ranged touch inflicts 1d3 HP
Read Magic (S0 Divi): Self can read magical writing for 160 min
Scare (S2 Necr): R65' 5 targets w/up to 5 HD in 30' radius flee for 16 rd (DC 15 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Scatterspray (S1 Tran): R65' Little items in 1' radius scatter, inflicting 1d8 on creatures w/in 10' (DC 14 Ref neg)
Magic Notes:
Caster Level Bonus: +10 base class level for spells known and spells/dy
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Greater Spell Focus (Conjuration): +3 Spell DC (Conjuration)
Spell Focus (Conjuration): +1 Spell DC (Conjuration)
Arcane Spell Failure: 10%
Insidious Magic: Weave casters require successful DC 27 caster level check to detect self spells other than evocation and transmutation; self requires successful DC 9 + casterLevel caster level check to detect Weave spells other than enchantment, illusion, and necromancy
Pernicious Magic: Weave casters require successful DC 27 caster level check to counter self spells other than evocation and transmutation; self requires successful DC 9 + casterLevel caster level check to counter Weave spells other than enchantment, illusion, and necromancy
Shadow Double: May create clone lasting 16 rd 1/dy
Shadow Walk: May travel quickly via Plane of Shadow for 10 hr
Shadow Weave Magic: +1 DC and resistance checks on enchantment, illusion, necromancy, and darkness descriptor spells/-1 caster level on evocation and transmutation spells/May not cast light descriptor spells
Shield Of Shadows: May use Shield effects w/75% concealment 16 rd/dy
Spell Power: +3 spell DC and resistance checks
Still Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out movement
Tenacious Magic: Weave casters require successful DC 31 caster level check to dispel self spells other than evocation and transmutation; self requires successful DC 13 + casterLevel caster level check to dispel Weave spells other than enchantment, illusion, and necromancy
Twin Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cause spell to take effect twice

Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: May deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Speak With Master: May talk w/master in secret language
